Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using the Markdown format.
Here is the summary of the meeting:

Status on Merge Condition: The condition has been implemented but needs to be tested. 
Merge Condition will likely go live next week, pending testing.

Devnet status for Bellatrix (Ethereum 2.0) was discussed and it's expected that devnets should start being deployed in a few days.
The team is working on the merge of CL with EL which has been progressing well so far.
